actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Chafee. With written report No. 97-443.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 629.

official_title: An original bill to amend and extend the Clean Water Act, as amended, for one year, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Water Act (also known as the Federal Water Pollution Control Act) to extend through FY 1983: (1) authorizations of appropriations for specified programs, including programs of investigations and information, operator training, State program grants, student training, and clean lakes grants; and (2) the general authorization of appropriations to carry out such Act.

titles.title: An original bill to amend and extend the Clean Water Act, as amended, for one year, and for other purposes.
